text: Consider an unsorted array with n elements. The array has this property that every element in array is at most â€˜@ distance from its position in sorted array. Which sorting algorithm can be easily modified for sorting this array and what is the obtainable time complexity? (Assume d is positive integer and d < n) (Note: You can use O(k) auxiliary space. and select more appropriate option) (a) Insertion Sort with time complexity O (k n) (b) Heap Sort with time complexity O (n log k) (c) Quick Sort with time complexity O (k log k) (d) Merge Sort with time complexity O (k log k)
